title: Forever Young
description: WINNER OF THE NOBEL PRIZE IN LITERATUREThe classic anthem to youth from Bob Dylan, one of our best-loved songwriters, reimagined as a picture book by award-winning illustrator Paul Rogers.Since it first appeared on the 1974 album Planet Waves , "Forever Young" has been one of Bob Dylan's most beloved songs. Now award-winning artist Paul Rogers gives us a new interpretation of the lyrics. With images inspired by classic Dylan songs and pieces of his life, this is a bold and touching tribute to an anthem whose message will always stay forever young.
author: Bob Dylan
